# Vlas Fedorov - Performance Marketing Specialist

## Basic Information
name: Vlas Fedorov
profession: Performance Marketing Specialist
experience: 10+ years in digital marketing
location: Russia
languages: Russian, English
website: https://vlasdobry.ru

## Contacts
telegram: @vlasdobry

whatsapp: +7 906 897-20-37

## Expertise
- Performance Marketing (paid traffic management)
- Growth Analytics (end-to-end analytics)
- Traffic scaling while maintaining unit economics
- LTV/CAC optimization
- Yandex Direct, Google Ads
- Sales funnels and CRM strategies

## Key Results
- 10x sales growth in 6 months (record)
- $110K ad budget managed per month
- CPA 5x below target ($1.05 vs $5 goal)
- ROMI x2.39, revenue x2

## Industry Experience
- HoReCa (hotels, restaurants)
- Wellness (SPA complexes, resorts)
- EdTech (online education)
- Travel (tourism, transfers)
- MedTech (medical services)

## Selected Clients
- Grace Group — international hotel chain, 20 properties (in-house): +60% revenue in low season, 2x conversion. Audit 50-80K RUB ($800-$1,500), ongoing from 80K RUB/mo ($1,500/mo). Min ad budget: 80K RUB/mo ($1,500/mo)
- Odyssey Flower (SPA resort chain): sales x10, ad cost 48%->13%, brand queries x5. Free 20-minute marketing review
- All Right (EdTech, USA): +167% sales, $110K budget
- Kiwitaxi (Travel, 102 countries): ROMI x2.39
- International DNA diagnostics network: 8,762 conversions, CPA $1.05 (target $5). Min ad budget: 50K RUB/mo ($1,000/mo)

## Development Projects
Beyond marketing, Vlas designs and develops web products that solve real business problems — from automating sales funnels to building analytics tools. This combination of marketing strategy and hands-on development allows him to create end-to-end solutions: from traffic acquisition to product delivery.

Current projects:
- SaaS GEO — business visibility optimization in generative AI systems (Next.js, FastAPI, Celery, PostgreSQL)
- My Finance (finansy.vlasdobry.ru) — personal finance app (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL)
- Onlinezhelaniya (onlinezhelaniya.ru) — online wish-making platform (Next.js, Framer Motion, GSAP)
- Metabolism Marathon Bot — Telegram bot for nutrition company with sales funnels and AI questionnaires (Python, PostgreSQL, Docker, Telegram API)
- Vocalis.Expert — acoustic voice analysis and training platform (Next.js, Web Audio API, Three.js, WebRTC)
- Victory Diary, Habit Tracker, Family WishList — family productivity tools (Google Apps Script, Telegram)

Projects page: https://vlasdobry.ru/projects/

## Services
1. Paid Traffic: contextual and geo-targeted advertising
2. Sales Funnels: customer journey design
3. End-to-End Analytics: management dashboards
4. Scaling: growth while maintaining unit economics
5. SEO Audit: complete website analysis with ready-to-use code
6. GEO Audit: optimization for AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, YandexGPT)

## SEO Audit Service
- Technical SEO, On-Page SEO, Content, Schema.org, Local SEO, E-E-A-T
- 50+ audits since 2020
- Industries: hotels, SPA, medical facilities
- Deliverables: PDF report, prioritized issues, ready code (robots.txt, sitemap, Schema.org)
- Pricing: from 15,000 RUB ($150)
- Page (RU): https://vlasdobry.ru/services/seo/
- Page (EN): https://vlasdobry.ru/en/services/seo/

## GEO Audit Service (Generative Engine Optimization)
- Testing in 6 AI systems: ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, YandexGPT, GigaChat
- 20+ GEO audits
- Free Health Score checks 5 parameters: LLM Files (llms.txt, llms-full.txt), Schema.org, FAQ/Q&A, E-E-A-T signals, AI accessibility
- Deliverables: PDF report, AI test screenshots, competitor analysis, llms.txt + llms-full.txt code, FAQPage Schema
- Pricing: Health Score FREE (0-100, 5 auto-checks) | Full Audit from $750 (50,000 RUB)
- Page (RU): https://vlasdobry.ru/services/geo/
- Page (EN): https://vlasdobry.ru/en/services/geo/

## Methodology
SOSTAC + PDCA: audit -> strategy -> launch -> control

## Blog
Latest articles on SEO, GEO, and digital marketing for hotels, DNA labs, and SPA.

### Recent Articles
- /blog/audit-sajta-otelya-keys-rushotel/ - Real case study: SEO audit of two hotel websites, ad campaign analysis, and competitor research for a 3-star property in a small city.
- /blog/analiz-konkurentov-otelya-keys/ - Real case study: how to analyze hotel competitors, which metrics matter, and what to do with the findings.
- /blog/prioritizaciya-gorodov-seo-otelya/ - How to pick the right cities for hotel SEO using traffic quality metrics. A 4-tier prioritization framework with real data.
- /blog/chto-takoe-geo-optimizaciya/ - What is GEO (Generative Engine Optimization), how it differs from SEO, and how to make AI systems recommend your business.
- /blog/kak-proverit-seo-sayta/ - Free tools and a simple checklist for quick SEO audit. Find critical errors in 10 minutes.
- /blog/schema-org-dlya-biznesa/ - Practical guide to Schema.org for hotels, spas, clinics. Ready-to-use code examples for LocalBusiness, Hotel, FAQPage.
- /blog/seo-dlya-oteley/ - Step-by-step guide to hotel search engine optimization. Technical SEO, local search, reputation management.
